How to fill this field: For entity that is not an individual. E.g., orgnization.

Date intervals permitted; Date sets are not permitted. Example 1 : '1984?'   year uncertain (possibly the year 1984, but not definitely). Example 2:  ‘1964/2008’ is a time interval with calendar year precision, beginning sometime in 1964 and ending sometime in 2008. Example 3: The character 'X' may be used in place of one or more rightmost digits to indicate that the value of that digit is unspecified, for the following cases:    ‘201X’ or   ‘20XX’
Only applicable to serial. Most monographs don't need this info.
prefilled with "copyright not evaluated" but can choose proper statement if copyright status is determined
